moreItemsAvailable.description: Whether more pages can be retrieved after this page

currentStartIndex.description: Start row of the items in this page

currentMaxItems.description: Maximum number of items on this page

nextStartIndex.description: Value to use for the start index to retrieve the next page, if there is a next page.  -1 means there is no next page.

currentSortField.description: The field on which the current page is sorted

currentSortAscending.description: Whether this page is sorted ascending (true) or descending (false)

id.description: MS Exchange ID for this item

created.description: Create date, in JSON date format

modified.description: Modify date, in JSON date format

sent.description: Send date, in JSON date format

startDate.description: Start date, in JSON date format

endDate.description: End date, in JSON date format
